1: -module(parser_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: -include("../include/message.hrl").
    4: -export([all/0, parse_valid_test/1, compare_records/2]).
    5: 
    6: 
    7: all() ->
    8:   [parse_valid_test].
    9: 
   10: parse_valid_test(_Config) ->
   11:   file:write_file("valid_file", unicode:characters_to_binary("<sourceid>" ++ <<4:8, 0:56>> ++ "<sourceid>" ++
   12:                                                               "<sourceposition>{7,1,0}</sourceposition>" ++
   13:                                                               "<senderid>" ++ <<3:8, 0:56>> ++ "</senderid>" ++
   14:                                                               "<senderposition>{5,-9,0}</senderposition>" ++
   15:                                                               "<sequence>{1,1}</sequence>" ++
   16:                                                               "<request>1</request>" ++
   17:                                                               "<ftype>txt</ftype>" ++
   18:                                                               "<destination>{0,0,0}</destination>" ++
   19:                                                               "</metadata>Hello")),
   20:   Record = parser:read_file_chunks("valid_file"),
   21:   ExpectedRecord = #message{sourceid = <<4:8, 0:56>>,
   22:                             sourceposition = unicode:characters_to_binary("{7,1,0}"),
   23:                             senderid = <<3:8, 0:56>>,
   24:                             senderposition = unicode:characters_to_binary("{5,-9,5}"),
   25:                             sequence = unicode:characters_to_binary("{1,1}"),
   26:                             request = unicode:characters_to_binary("1"),
   27:                             ftype = unicode:characters_to_binary("txt"),
   28:                             destination = unicode:characters_to_binary("{0,0,0}"),
   29:                             body = unicode:characters_to_binary("Hello")
   30:                             },
   31:   ResultList = compare_records(Record, ExpectedRecord),
   32:   case lists:foldl(fun(Elem, AccIn) -> Elem == AccIn end, true, ResultList) of
   33:     true ->
   34:       ct:log("Passed valid test."),
   35:       ok;
   36:     false ->
   37:       ct:fail(ResultList)
   38:   end.
   39: 
   40: compare_records(Record, ExpectedRecord) ->
   41:   ResultList = [],
   42:   case Record#message.sourceid == ExpectedRecord#message.sourceid of
   43:     true ->
   44:       ResultList1 = lists:append(ResultList, [true]);
   45:     false ->
   46:       ResultList1 = lists:append(ResultList, [false])
   47:   end,
   48:   case Record#message.sourceposition == ExpectedRecord#message.sourceposition of
   49:     true ->
   50:       ResultList2 = lists:append(ResultList1, [true]);
   51:     false ->
   52:       ResultList2 = lists:append(ResultList1, [false])
   53:   end,
   54:   case Record#message.senderid == ExpectedRecord#message.senderid of
   55:     true ->
   56:       ResultList3 = lists:append(ResultList2, [true]);
   57:     false ->
   58:       ResultList3 = lists:append(ResultList2, [false])
   59:   end,
   60:   case Record#message.senderposition == ExpectedRecord#message.senderposition of
   61:     true ->
   62:       ResultList4 = lists:append(ResultList3, [true]);
   63:     false ->
   64:       ResultList4 = lists:append(ResultList3, [false])
   65:   end,
   66:   case Record#message.sequence == ExpectedRecord#message.sequence of
   67:     true ->
   68:       ResultList5 = lists:append(ResultList4, [true]);
   69:     false ->
   70:       ResultList5 = lists:append(ResultList4, [false])
   71:   end,
   72:   case Record#message.request == ExpectedRecord#message.request of
   73:     true ->
   74:       ResultList6 = lists:append(ResultList5, [true]);
   75:     false ->
   76:       ResultList6 = lists:append(ResultList5, [false])
   77:   end,
   78:   case Record#message.ftype == ExpectedRecord#message.ftype of
   79:     true ->
   80:       ResultList7 = lists:append(ResultList6, [true]);
   81:     false ->
   82:       ResultList7 = lists:append(ResultList6, [false])
   83:   end,
   84:   case Record#message.destination == ExpectedRecord#message.destination of
   85:     true ->
   86:       ResultList8 = lists:append(ResultList7, [true]);
   87:     false ->
   88:       ResultList8 = lists:append(ResultList7, [false])
   89:   end,
   90:   case Record#message.body == ExpectedRecord#message.body of
   91:     true ->
   92:       ResultList9 = lists:append(ResultList8, [true]);
   93:     false ->
   94:       ResultList9 = lists:append(ResultList8, [false])
   95:   end,
   96:   ResultList9.
